mapper.select: select reply_code, reply_content, reply_del, reply_date, board_num, userid from reply
select reply_code, reply_content, reply_del, reply_date, board_num, userid from reply where reply_code=#{reply_code}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (reply_code, reply_content, reply_del, reply_date, board_num, userid) values (#{reply_code}, #{reply_content},#{reply_del}, sysdate, #{board_num},#{userid})
mapper.update: update reply set reply_code=#{reply_code}, reply_content=#{reply_content}, reply_del=#{reply_del}, reply_date=sysdate, board_num=#{board_num}, userid=#{userid} where reply_code=#{reply_code}
